title: Community-Owned Data Centers – The 'Impossible' Solution
manipulative_claims: Too technically complex for communities to manage
Too expensive for local groups to afford
Requires specialized expertise only corporations have
Security risks if not centrally controlled

suppressed_realities.technical: Communities already manage critical infrastructure (e.g., water systems, hospitals)
suppressed_realities.security: Distributed systems are often more secure
suppressed_realities.reliability: Local ownership allows rapid, responsive maintenance

why_they_fear_it: AI maintained by those prioritizing ethical outcomes
No corporate kill-switches or compliance threats
Integration with local renewable energy sources
Governance by community, not corporate mandate
Removes profit incentive from AI development

solution_formula.result: Breaks dependence on centralized control mechanisms
